name: battlecode-schema
description: flatbuffers parser for battlecode match files

scripts.build-and-distribute: npm run build && npm run copy-to-engine && cd ../client && npm run fix-schema
scripts.build-mac: ./flatc-mac --ts --ts-no-import-ext -o ts battlecode.fbs && ./flatc-mac --java -o java battlecode.fbs && ./flatc-mac --python --python-typing --python-import-override ..schema -o python battlecode.fbs && tsc
scripts.build-windows: flatc-windows --ts --ts-no-import-ext -o ts battlecode.fbs && flatc-windows --java -o java battlecode.fbs && flatc-windows --python --python-typing --python-import-override ..schema -o python battlecode.fbs && tsc

author: Teh Devs
